verifyProof(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Note that a double-signaling check is not included here, and should be carried by the caller.

params.externalNullifierHash: A keccak256 hash of the external nullifier
params.groupId: The id of the Semaphore group
params.signalHash: A keccak256 hash of the Semaphore signal

verifyProof(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Reverts if the zero-knowledge proof is invalid.
